pageContext.claim: “The former ambassador from the United States, the woman, was bad news and the people she was dealing with in the Ukraine were bad news so I just want to let you know that.”
pageContext.analysis: Marie Yovanovitch is a career diplomat with a sterling reputation. She was removed early from her post, apparently at the behest of Trump attorney Rudy Giuliani. There is no evidence that she was "bad news."
